title: Entity Template
description: Entity templates for applying values to entities.

$id.description: Unique identifier of the template resource.

content.description: The values of all the fields the template should apply.

entityTypes.description: The unique identifiers of the entity types this template is available for.

externalId.description: The ID to be used by the API.

labelsToApply.description: The unique identifiers of the labels this template should apply to entities.

localeCode.description: The locale code of the language profiles this template is available for.
